statements: DELETE FROM Political_Organizations WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND donor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Political_Organizations WHERE donation_amount >= 1000 AND donation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_budget < 50000.00 AND campaign_start_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM political_organizations WHERE org_leader = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM donors WHERE donor_state = 'CA' AND donor_city LIKE 'San%';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Fundraiser';
